column2: I can't stay good enough things about their service. Not only are they super polite and efficient
column3: but they are professional and extremely thorough. They were eloquent in explaining various dishes
column4: extremely patient with my group and I the whole way
column5: and very diligent about making sure our table got what they needed. In just this aspect
column6: Uchi is certainly a standout in a class of its own.
